item.title: Pin-Tuning: Parameter-Efficient In-Context Tuning for Few-Shot Molecular Property Prediction
item.description: Pin-Tuning: A parameter-efficient method for few-shot molecular property prediction that significantly improves accuracy with fewer trainable parameters via in-context tuning and Bayesian weight cons…
